member.name: IMFMediaError.GetErrorCode
member.returns: Returns a value from the enumeration.

member.name: IMFMediaError.GetExtendedErrorCode
member.returns: Returns an HRESULT value that gives additional information about the last error.

member.name: IMFMediaError.SetErrorCode
member.param: The error code, specified as an value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaError.SetExtendedErrorCode
member.param: An HRESULT value that gives additional information about the last error.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaError
member.summary: Provides the current error status for the Media Engine.
